name: HYPE
description: $HYPE is a deflationary crypto combining auto-liquidity and token burns—cutting supply, boosting scarcity, and fueling long-term value. In the ever-expanding world of decentralized finance, meme coins often come and go. But the creators of $HYPE knew they needed more than just fun memes—they needed a strong mechanism to give the token long-term value. Their solution? A deflationary model powered by an automatic token burn, increasing scarcity with every transaction.
